articles.title: Another 122 people recover health in Sukkur quarantine facility
articles.description: The commissioner said the people were tested again after completion of 14 days time period of quarantine and were tested negative.
articles.content:
SUKKUR: Another 122 people kept in isolated quarantine facility in Sukkur on Tuesday were declared fit and healthy, said Commissioner Shafique Ahmed Mahesar.

articles.title: Coronavirus patients contagious days after symptoms disappear: study - ARY NEWS
articles.description: A team of researchers from Yale University School of Medicine in a US state found that about half the COVID-19 patients in China carried the virus even after they appeared to have recovered
articles.content:
A new study suggests people affected by coronavirus may be contagious for several days after their symptoms disappear.
